attributes.action: financially support our workers,hospitals, education, communities and senior citizens instead of giving finance to those who arrive in Britain by way of housing, benefits, food vouchers and transport to other cultures who enter this country whether legally or illegally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please support and think about the hardworking people in this country, the senior citizens who have worked and served our country and our future generations who want to be educated and work in our country.
It seems that those who want to educate themselves and work are penalised for doing so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
